channel.title: Cyberus
channel.description:
Cyberus is a 317 Hyperion based server. The main idea of the first world is combat. Perfect combat. Since Hyperion already has an Entity based system it will be much easier than programming combat for another base. But, even if its easier, it still doesn't make it easy. Which is why I would like some help. If you are interested in more check out the development thread at: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,472125.0.html If you are interested in applying post here with this format:
Name: Languages known & how long you have been using them (The server uses some JScript and XML): Experience with the 317 protocol: Experience with Hyperion (You don't really need any): MSN:

item.title: Cyberus
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:2, topic:376193”]Name: Rix
Languages known & how long you have been using them (The server uses some JScript and XML): Java (1 1/2 year), Ruby (2 months)
Experience with the 317 protocol: High
Experience with Hyperion (You don’t really need any): None
MSN: rix@hotmail.sg

Edit: I might change my mind about this. :|[/quote]
Yea sorry, but two weeks just isn’t enough time.

Read full topic
